name: Freezing Glare
effect:
Inflicts Wounds. 
 At Silver Rank, increase this move's power to 4.
 At Gold Rank, this move inflicts Frostbite.
 At Platinum Rank, increase this move's power to 6.
 At Diamond Rank, a random different Foe takes defense ignoring damage equal to 50% of the HP the original target lost.
description: The Pokémon shoots beams from its eyes, measured at absolute zero. Any foe caught in the beams too long will be frozen solid, any others will suffer frostbite.
